item.title: Poll Responses Not Loading (UI)
item.content:encoded:
High - Poll Response Display Issue Summary: An issue with loading errors for Poll Responses in the UI is currently being investigated. A recent Agent update caused the problem, and the roll-back has restored visibility. Pendo Engineering is working on a resolution.

Nov 3, 10:52 EDT
Resolved - A new version of the Agent update has been released fully resolving the Poll Response display issue.

Nov 3, 10:05 EDT
Identified - The issue has been identified in a recent Agent update. We have rolled back that update and restored Poll Response visibility in the UI.

Nov 3, 09:35 EDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating loading errors for Poll Responses in the UI. Note: data collection has not been impacted.

Pendo Engineering is reviewing the issue and we will provide updates as soon as they are available.

item.title: Guide Latency Issues: CNAME Customers Only
item.content:encoded:
Oct 5, 16:27 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 5, 13:41 EDT
Monitoring - Issue has been identified and monitoring the situation.

Oct 5, 11:01 EDT
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Oct 5, 10:55 EDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating some guide latency impacting CNAME customers. Potential issues serving guides to end users.

Pendo Engineering is reviewing the issue and we will provide updates as soon as they are available.

item.title: Pendo Feedback: Webhook Outage
item.content:encoded:
Sep 29, 18:05 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 28, 19:18 EDT
Monitoring - A fix has been deployed to resolve an ongoing outage with Pendo Feedback Webhooks. We will update this page when webhook performance returns to normal operation.

item.title: Webhook Delivery Delays
item.content:encoded:
Sep 20, 16:27 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 20, 15:47 EDT
Identified - The issue has been identified, and we are working on a fix.

item.title: Page and Feature Events Showing 0 When Filtered by Today
item.content:encoded:
Sep 13, 14:33 EDT
Resolved - The hotfix has been deployed and the issue has been resolved, please refresh any opened tabs if you are still seeing 0 values on Pages and Features. If you are still experiencing this issue post-refresh, please contact our support team via the Resource Center in Pendo.

Sep 13, 14:10 EDT
Identified - Pendo engineering is currently investigating an issue in the Pendo UI that is causing Pages and Features in app.pendo.io to show a count of 0 when filtered by "Today". We have identified a hotfix that should resolve the issue and are working to release this as soon as possible. Please note that data collection has not been impacted by this incident.

item.title: Login functionality for Feedback for internal users is experiencing an outage (US only)
item.content:encoded:
Sep 11, 08:42 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Some users may need to log out and log back in.

Sep 11, 08:02 EDT
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Sep 11, 07:28 EDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

item.title: Resource Center Announcement Guides Temporarily Uneditable
item.content:encoded:
Aug 29, 18:40 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 29, 17:34 EDT
Identified - We have identified the source of the issue and are working on deploying a fix.

Aug 29, 17:06 EDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating an ongoing issue that is preventing Pendo users from editing announcement guides within the Resource Center.

item.title: Dashboard, Visitor Reports, and Similar Data Sources May Temporarily Appear as Zero
item.content:encoded:
Jul 21, 16:34 EDT
Resolved - The incident has been resolved. Reports across Pendo should be working as expected. Data collection was not impacted by this incident, so no data should be missing from reports or dashboards.

Jul 21, 14:58 EDT
Investigating - We are aware of a current issue where certain reports are returning 0 values in app.pendo.io. Note: data collection has not been impacted.

item.title: Guide Targeting and Eligibility Impacted for JP Region
item.content:encoded:
Jul 19, 18:52 EDT
Resolved - The incident has been resolved. Guide targeting and eligibility has returned to normal functioning.

Jul 19, 18:41 EDT
Monitoring - A fix has been deployed and we are monitoring the results.

Jul 19, 18:25 EDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue that may affect guide targeting and eligibility in our Japan environment. Users affected may see guides multiple times during this incident, which began 4:00 PM Eastern Time.

item.title: Guide Targeting and Eligibility Impacted for US1/EU Customers
item.content:encoded:
Jul 19, 16:00 EDT
Resolved - Between 4:00 and 6:00 PM U.S. Eastern Time, guide targeting and eligibility was degraded for both US-1 and EU customers. End users may have seen guides multiple times, or did not see guides that they normally should have seen. This issue was fully resolved by 6:10 PM U.S. Eastern Time. Analytics should not be impacted.

item.title: Login and Mid-Session Disconnection Issues with Pendo UI
item.content:encoded:
Jul 11, 11:30 EDT
Resolved - Pendo became aware of problems logging into the Pendo platform, as well as some users being logged out mid-session at 11:40am US Eastern Time today. A fix was developed and deployed at 11:49am US Eastern Time, no further issues have been detected at this time. Pendo should be working normally for all customers, if you are experiencing continued issues, please contact our support team here: https://support.pendo.io/hc/en-us/articles/360034163971-Get-help-with-Pendo-from-technical-support

item.title: Pendo Internal Resource Center Offline
item.content:encoded:
Apr 27, 10:36 EDT
Resolved - The Resource Center is restored and back to full functionality.

Apr 27, 10:35 EDT
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Apr 27, 09:49 EDT
Investigating - The Pendo Resource Center is currently offline. We are working to restore this as quickly as possible.

item.title: Pendo Guides Failing to Display
item.content:encoded:
Mar 7, 18:25 EST
Resolved - The issue has been resolved.

Mar 7, 18:07 EST
Update - The hotfix to address this issue has been deployed. We are currently monitoring guide traffic to ensure that guides are back to full operation.

Mar 7, 18:06 EST
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Mar 7, 18:06 EST
Monitoring - The hotfix to address this issue has been deployed. We are currently monitoring guide traffic to ensure that guides are back to full operation.

Mar 7, 17:55 EST
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being deployed now. This page will update again when the fix has been fully deployed.

Mar 7, 17:19 EST
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue where Pendo guides are failing to load for some customers.

item.title: Possible delay in Webhook Message Delivery
item.content:encoded:
Mar 2, 13:21 EST
Resolved - At this point, message processing has caught up with current volume and users should no longer be experiencing delays.

If further issues are seen, please contact Pendo Technical Success.

Mar 2, 12:49 EST
Identified - We are continuing to monitor the source of the delay and work to rectify. We will provide additional information around improved speed of delivery as soon as it is available.

Mar 2, 10:44 EST
Investigating - Webhook message delivery may be delayed. We are currently investigating this issue.

item.title: Intermittent Issues Navigating to Pendo Feedback
item.content:encoded:
Jan 30, 20:29 EST
Resolved - Navigating to Pendo Feedback from within the Pendo UI should now be back to working as expected. The issue was caused by some changes made to app.pendo.io earlier today that have been rolled back.

Jan 30, 19:29 EST
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an issue with switching to the Pendo Feedback product using the in-app product switcher. While we investigate, you should still be able to access Pendo Feedback directly by using the specific URL for your region:

US: https://feedback.us.pendo.io/app
EU: https://feedback.eu.pendo.io/app/

item.title: Issue with Mobile Guides and Analytics
item.content:encoded:
Oct 20, 14:19 EDT
Resolved - At this point we are confident that the issues previously seen with Mobile functionality is resolved.

If customers experience additional issues, please contact Pendo Technical Success

Oct 20, 12:53 EDT
Monitoring - Our engineering teams have made the appropriate adjustments and we believe Mobile Analytics and Guides are now functioning as expected.
We are continuing to monitor our performance to ensure appropriate functionality. Once we believe the issues are fully resolved we will update appropriately.

Oct 20, 12:35 EDT
Investigating - We have been made aware of an issue with our Mobile functionality across the Pendo platform. This is believed to be impacting Analytics and Guides for Mobile.
Our team is aware and working quickly to understand the scope of the issue and steps to resolution.
We will provide an update as soon as one is available.

item.title: Guide Errors and Latency
item.content:encoded:
Sep 27, 03:30 EDT
Resolved - Google experienced an issue in Datastore which impacted Pendo customers in pendo-eu, particularly with guide errors and latency. The issue was resolved at approximately 5:30 ET, for a total impacted time of approximately 2 hours. There should be no outstanding issues remaining, and no action necessary for Pendo customers to resume normal operations.

item.title: Some Guides are Not Able to be Saved
item.content:encoded:
Sep 9, 15:47 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 9, 13:55 EDT
Monitoring - The issue has been identified and a fix has been deployed. We are continuing to monitor the situation and will update if there are any additional findings.

Sep 9, 11:45 EDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue that is causing certain users to be unable to save their guides. The deployment of existing guides is not impacted.

item.title: App.Pendo.io Unresponsive / Guide Delivery Issues
item.content:encoded:
Aug 31, 15:51 EDT
Resolved - At this point we're confident that guide deliverability, inclusive of Resource Center deployments, should now be fully operational.

If any further issues are seen, please contact Pendo Technical Success.

Aug 31, 15:32 EDT
Identified - We have identified the cause of the issue and are working through the fix and monitoring impact.

Guide deliverability should now be recovering and we will continue monitoring for full resolution. Additional updates will be provided as soon as they are available.

Aug 31, 14:57 EDT
Investigating - While the Pendo application should now be available, we are now aware of impact to our guide deliverability where guides may not be displaying as intended.

Our engineering team is aware and working to provide resolution as quickly as possible.

We will provide updates as soon as they are available.

Aug 31, 14:39 EDT
Monitoring - We are aware that the Pendo application, accessed at app.pendo.io, was previously unresponsive.

We believe we have made the appropriate changes to resolve the issue, but are continuing to monitor.

We will provide updates once we believe the issue to be fully resolved.

item.title: Events Processing Errors
item.content:encoded:
May 16, 09:43 EDT
Resolved - At this point, our team has restored our systems to normal functionality with event processing occurring normally. Any Pendo subscriptions that may have experienced a delay in processing can expect data for events to reflect normally within the next 24 hours.

Please contact Pendo Technical Success should any further issues be seen.

May 16, 08:45 EDT
Investigating - System errors suggest collected events may not be processing correctly as of 8:15 AM EDT. We are currently investigating.

item.title: Guide Deployment Impacted
item.content:encoded:
May 12, 17:48 EDT
Resolved - The incident has been resolved and guides are deploying as expected.

May 12, 16:57 EDT
Monitoring - We are aware of an impact to our guide delivery service. This is causing some guides to fail to be delivered to visitors, even when eligible. We are actively deploying a fix to our code that will remediate the issue.

item.title: Tagging Processing Delays
item.content:encoded:
May 4, 21:03 EDT
Resolved - Issue has been resolved, remaining processing jobs have completed or are catching up to complete shortly.

May 4, 16:35 EDT
Investigating - We are currently experiencing some delays in processing newly tagged pages and features. The issue has been identified and we are currently working to correct the problem as quickly as possible.

item.title: Sporadic Issues with Guide Deployment
item.content:encoded:
Apr 29, 13:30 EDT
Resolved - The issue has been resolved.

Apr 29, 13:00 EDT
Investigating - We are currently experiencing some intermittent guide delivery failures within app.pendo.io. We are actively investigating the issue now and will update as soon as we have more to share.

item.title: Ongoing Issue Across Pendo Platform
item.content:encoded:
Apr 28, 12:57 EDT
Resolved - The Google Cloud Platform team has confirmed that the outage has been resolved. Data collection and guide delivery were not observed to be delayed or impacted in any capacity during this outage.

Apr 28, 11:48 EDT
Monitoring - The issue has been remediated, we are continuing to monitor for now. Google Cloud Platform is experiencing a temporary outage that has affected app.pendo.io.

Apr 28, 10:29 EDT
Investigating - We are aware that parts of the Pendo platform are currently unavailable including access to app.Pendo.io. We are working to resolve and will provide and update as soon as possible

item.title: Analytics Processing Delays
item.content:encoded:
Apr 5, 15:18 EDT
Resolved - All data processing jobs are caught up and operating as expected.

Apr 5, 13:57 EDT
Monitoring - Data processing delay root cause has been addressed. A small number of subscriptions may continue to experience delays as these systems catch up. We'll continue monitoring until we feel the issue is completely resolved.

Apr 5, 12:09 EDT
Investigating - We have received reports from customers and are aware of delays in data appearing within the Pendo Insights and Analytics UI. We believe this is impacting some, but not all of our customers.

Our engineers are aware of the problem and working to resolve. We will provide updates here as soon as they are available.
